video.title: Blurry Effect: CSS Tutorial (Day 29 of CSS3 in 30 Days)
video.description:
Create a blurred depth of field effect with CSS3!

⭐️Files you need ⭐️
💻Blurry Effect Code: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/fsiac0oezw9wode/AAAazOlFVobJpNFCFBiB8g3Ia?dl=0
💻All tutorials in this series need this "_theme-styles" directory (only download once): https://www.dropbox.com/sh/890hx6ke34oovaz/AAByJ-jb-H5pWuIUx7t_GvQqa?dl=0

This video works as a stand-alone tutorial but is also day 29 of CSS3 in 30 Days. For the rest of the series, check out this playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLWKjhJtqVAbl1AfjiGyYxwpdAPi5v-1OU

CSS3 in 30 Days is developed by Brad Hussey. Check out his website for more great tutorials: https://codecollege.ca/

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.org
